eulaWelcome: Welcome to the Olympia App! By using this application, you agree to the following terms:
eula1: You will not misuse the app.
eula2: Content must not be offensive, discriminatory, or illegal.
eula3: The app may use necessary cookies to store your settings and preferences.
eula4: Data is processed in accordance with our privacy policy.
eula5: Sharing login credentials with third parties is not permitted.
eula6: You can withdraw your consent at any time in the settings.
eula7: The creation of user content visible to other users must not contain offensive material. Violations will result in immediate exclusion.
eulaInfo: This license agreement comes into effect immediately upon acceptance. Please read it carefully.
eulaCookiesConsent: I additionally agree to the use of optional cookies.
eulaDeclined: You must accept the EULA to use the app.
cookiesDeclined: Please agree to the cookies to continue.
